summary: This bill, the Transnational Criminal Organization Illicit Spotter Prevention and Elimination Act, aims to enhance penalties for hindering immigration, border, and customs controls. It specifically targets individuals who transmit information about law enforcement activities to facilitate federal crimes related to immigration, customs, and other border controls. The bill also criminalizes the destruction or alteration of border control infrastructure. Furthermore, it amends existing laws to address firearm use during alien smuggling and makes conforming amendments to various sections of the United States Code.
